INT_MIN : nums1[cut1-1];\n            int l2 = (cut2 == 0) ? INT_MIN : nums2[cut2-1];\n            int r1 = (cut1 == m) ? INT_MAX : nums1[cut1];\n            int r2 = (cut2 == n) ?
